Def.ResearchDesc: Optimized payload packing allows more room inside the missile for thrust generating components, resulting in massive velocity increases.
Def.ResearchDescDisc: Superior packing methodology upgrades are now complete, all strategic missiles are now automatically designed for increased world travel speed.

Def.label: Research packing methods
Def.description: A skilled researcher must plan a series of tests which can be performed on missile payloads to collect data for analysis.

Def.label: Gather weapons data
Def.description: Launch a strategic missile at any target to gather data, the amount of data gathered depends on the success of the launch with a successful detonation on the target giving the maximum.

Def.label: Research packing methods
Def.description: Analyze the data gathered and finalize the designs for the missiles.
